mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from admin_member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
select count(*) cnt from ORDERTBL where ORDER_DATE >= to_date(to_char(sysdate)) and ORDER_DATE < to_date(to_char(sysdate))+1
select count(*) cnt from ORDERTBL where PAY_DATE >= to_date(to_char(sysdate)) and PAY_DATE < to_date(to_char(sysdate))+1
select count(*) cnt from USER_MEMBER where JOINDATE >= to_date(to_char(sysdate)) and JOINDATE < to_date(to_char(sysdate))+1
select count(*) cnt from USER_LEAVE where LEAVEDATE >= to_date(to_char(sysdate)) and LEAVEDATE < to_date(to_char(sysdate))+1
select n.NOTICE_NUM, n.TITLE, n.NOTICE_DATE, n.TARGET, t.TARGET targets from notice n left join target t on n.TARGET = t.NUM
select r.* from (select n.*, t.TARGET targets from notice n left join target t on n.TARGET = t.NUM) r where r.notice_num = #{num}
mapper.update: update info_company set name = #{name}, value = #{val} where num = ${num}
mapper.insert: insert into info_company values(#{name}, null, info_company_seq.nextval)
